class.name: CSplitContainer
class.description: Horizontal or vertical split container depending on it's [member mode] setting. See [SplitContainer].

members.member: Sets whether this [CSplitContainer] will act as a [HSplitContainer] or a [VSplitContainer].

theme_items.theme_item: Boolean value. If 1 ([code]true[/code]), the grabber will hide automatically when it isn't under the cursor. If 0 ([code]false[/code]), it's always visible.
The horizontal or vertical space between the [CSplitContainer]'s elements.
The icon used for the horizontal grabber drawn in the middle area.
The icon used for the vertical grabber drawn in the middle area.
The background drawn under this control.
